channel.title: User Not premium?
channel.description: Finally gave in and decided to try? I havent purchased the full version because I am not sure if i will like this or not. So I am trying the free version. I downloaded the file from the second link on the guide topic, (not the tabbykiller one). I put both files on my desktop. I registered my username on the minecraft site and now when i try try to login it gives me the message user not premium? Any ideas. I can't click play offline because it says play online once to enable play offline? LOL catch 22 if you ask me.

item.title: User Not premium?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

first step: go to start menu.
2nd: click run(win XP) [if win 7 type in search bar: “run”, then click the program that appears]
3rd: type “%appdata%”(w/o quote) in to the “run” program.
4th: a window should pop-up. copy the “.minecraft” folder(it came with the download in Lin OP) in to that new explorer window.
5th: run minecraft_name.jar
6th: type the ign you want, press enter.
7th: play offline should be enabled.
8th follow the OP’s directions to connect to the server.

edit: OP=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,471687.0.html

Read full topic
